ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm songs being 'revisited'?
ygData.msgSnippet: They must have fixed it then.  I haven t tried to charm an uncharmable mob in a while. Talies, sorry to see you going, but glad you re going to stay here with
ygData.messageBody:
They must have fixed it then. I haven't tried to charm an uncharmable mob
in a while.

Talies, sorry to see you going, but glad you're going to stay here with us.
I have been very burned out on EQ lately. I haven't logged Elfson since
killing Vox on Thursday, and I know I won't touch him till at least next
Tuesday. (This week is packed in RL).

I told my regular Thursday group (where I am the cleric) that I may be
cancelling my account also. Similar thinking to what Talies wrote about,
I'm just tired of being treated poorly. Add to that BG2 (which I have
barely touched), Playstation2's imminent release, it being both hockey and
football season, and my theatrical hobby becoming more time consuming, it's
starting to seem not worth my $10 a month...

At least for a time (if I cancel) I will stay here too (stifle those
groans!), when Anrachy Online or whatever comes out next I will want to see
who is heading there.
